title: Open source XAML
body: Seriously, while we see a LOT of improvement of ASP.Net/Razor languages, and even the C# language, reducing a LOT of verbosity in each version, with a lot of awesome new features, XAML got what in the last years? {x:Bind}? Seriously, to be honest we LOSE a lot of features with transition of WPF -> UWP... DockPanels, Adorners, etc...

comments.body: They should also embrace UNO UWP platform
